title: Social Media Utilization Strategies for Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate Expertise in Science and Basic Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Science education for adult professionals utilizing a combination of asynchronous LMS and social media in a smartphone-based constrained technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can build a science-focused expert network on social media platforms and design a knowledge-sharing system.
Learners can execute collaborative projects in online learning communities using smartphone-based social media tools.
Based on social media-enhanced learning experiences, learners can develop and reflect on personalized digital learning strategies.

resources: Social Media Platform Access Permissions (KakaoTalk, Band, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
